verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Shoshannim, <S%H7799><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Maschil, <S%H4905><s%> A Song <S%H7892><s%> of loves. <S%H3039><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> is inditing <S%H7370><s%> a good <S%H2896><s%> matter: <S%H1697><s%> I <S%H589><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> of the things which I have made <S%H4639><s%> touching the king: <S%H4428><s%> my tongue <S%H3956><s%> is the pen <S%H5842><s%> of a ready <S%H4106><s%> writer. <S%H5608><s%>

Thou art fairer <S%H3302><s%> than the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of men: <S%H120><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> is poured <S%H3332><s%> into thy lips: <S%H8193><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Gird <S%H2296><s%> thy sword <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy thigh, <S%H3409><s%> O most mighty, <S%H1368><s%> with thy glory <S%H1935><s%> and thy majesty. <S%H1926><s%>

And in thy majesty <S%H1926><s%> ride <S%H7392><s%> prosperously <S%H6743><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and meekness <S%H6037><s%> and righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> and thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall teach <S%H3384><s%> thee terrible <S%H3372><s%> things.

Thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> are sharp <S%H8150><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> enemies; <S%H341><s%> whereby the people <S%H5971><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> thee.
Thy throne, <S%H3678><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> is forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever: <S%H5703><s%> the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of thy kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is a right <S%H4334><s%> scepter. <S%H7626><s%>

Thou lovest <S%H157><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and hatest <S%H8130><s%> wickedness: <S%H7562><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> hath anointed <S%H4886><s%> thee with the oil <S%H8081><s%> of gladness <S%H8342><s%> above thy fellows. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2270><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> thy garments <S%H899><s%> smell of myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> and aloes, <S%H174><s%> and cassia, <S%H7102><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the ivory <S%H8127><s%> palaces, <S%H1964><s%> whereby <S%H4480><s%> they have made thee glad. <S%H8055><s%>

Kings' <S%H4428><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> were among thy honorable <S%H3368><s%> women: upon thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> did stand <S%H5324><s%> the queen <S%H7694><s%> in gold <S%H3800><s%> of Ophir. <S%H211><s%>

Hearken, <S%H8085><s%> O daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and consider, <S%H7200><s%> and incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear; <S%H241><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> also thine own people, <S%H5971><s%> and thy father's <S%H1><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%>
So shall the king <S%H4428><s%> greatly desire <S%H183><s%> thy beauty: <S%H3308><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is thy Lord; <S%H113><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> thou him.

And the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> shall be there with a gift; <S%H4503><s%> even the rich <S%H6223><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> shall entreat <S%H2470><s%> thy favor. <S%H6440><s%>

The king's <S%H4428><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> is all <S%H3605><s%> glorious <S%H3520><s%> within: <S%H6441><s%> her clothing <S%H3830><s%> is of wrought <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4865><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

She shall be brought <S%H2986><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> in raiment of needlework: <S%H7553><s%> the virgins <S%H1330><s%> her companions <S%H7464><s%> that follow <S%H310><s%> her shall be brought <S%H935><s%> unto thee.
With gladness <S%H8057><s%> and rejoicing <S%H1524><s%> shall they be brought: <S%H2986><s%> they shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the king's <S%H4428><s%> palace. <S%H1964><s%>

Instead <S%H8478><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thy children, <S%H1121><s%> whom thou mayest make <S%H7896><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

I will make thy name <S%H8034><s%> to be remembered <S%H2142><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> generations: <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> thee forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
